ComicInfo.Summary:
CROSSOVER PART 2 The Fantastic Four are being pursued by the most unlikely of enemies on an alternate Earth - the Marvel Zombies. And the only ally they can turn to is…Magneto?
The story you never thought you’d see finds the fledgling F.F. on an alternate Earth pursued by the last people they’d expect!
But, will they be able to reason with – Magneto?!
ComicInfo.Title: Crossover: Part 2
